snippet: Cass Sunstein, President Obama's often provocative regulatory czar, is leaving the White House after more than three years and returning to Harvard Law School.
abstract: Cass Sunstein, President Obama's often provocative regulatory czar, is leaving the White House after more than three years and returning to Harvard Law School.

byline.original: By PETER BAKER and JOHN M. BRODER

headline.main: Top Regulatory Adviser to Depart White House
